Tunable.name: CAREGIVER_SITUATION
Tunable.description: The caregiver situation. Used to find the care dependent bit.

Tunable.name: FIRE_ALARM_ACTIVATION_RADIUS
Tunable.description: How far away from a given fire alarm a fire must be in order not to set it off.

Tunable.name: FIRE_ALARM_ACTIVE_STATE
Tunable.description: The state the fire alarm should be in while active

Tunable.name: FIRE_ALARM_CYCLE_TIME
Tunable.description: Time in sim minutes after a fire starts on a lot before fire alarms will start activating due to fires within range. This is also the time between checks to see if fires have been put out, for deactivation purposes.

Tunable.name: FIRE_ALARM_DEACTIVATED_STATE
Tunable.description: The state the fire alarm should be in while not active

Tunable.name: FIRE_BEEN_EXTINGUISHED_COMMODITY
Tunable.description:
A static commodity used to mark a fire object as having been extinguished.
If this commodity is present on the object when it burns out then it will be removed from the fire_object_quadtree so that fire can spark back up there.

TunableList.name: FIRE_BRIGADE_SITUATION
TunableList.description: A tested list of fire brigade situations that have a tunable chance of getting spun up when a fire occurs. This summons a volunteer fire npc that will attempt to put out the fire.

TunableTuple.description: An entry in this tested list.

Tunable.name: chance
Tunable.description: The base chance that the situation will appear when the fire service begins.

Tunable.name: situation
Tunable.description: situation that will get created.

Tunable.name: stop_processing
Tunable.description: If checked, no other element from this list is considered if this element passes its associated test.

TdescFragTag.name: test
TdescFragTag.description:
A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet.
ORs of ANDs

TdescFragTag.name: FIRE_CAN_SPREAD_TO_SIM_TESTS
TdescFragTag.display: Fire Can Spread To Sim Tests
TdescFragTag.description: A tunable set of tests which Sims are required to pass in order for fire to be placed at their location. If the tests fail fire will fail to spread to their location and they will not catch fire as a result.

Tunable.name: FIRE_EXTNIGUISH_NEARBY_RADIUS
Tunable.description: The radius that nearby fires or sims on fires will also be extinguished when a sim extinguishes a fire or a sim on fire.

TunableTuple.name: FIRE_INSURANCE_CLAIM_NOTIFICATION
TunableTuple.description: This is the dialog that will be displayed at the end of a fire that will alert the user of the amount of money they have been refunded as part of the fire insurance.

TunableVariant.description: If enabled, play an audio sting when the dialog is shown.

Tunable.name: immediate_audio
Tunable.description:
If checked, this audio will be triggered immediately, nothing will block.
ex. Earbuds audio will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name_hash
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the audio is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot. Otherwise the audio will be attached to the object's origin.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this audio is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description:
If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not.
If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played.
ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected.

Tunable.description: The ObjectStateValue a fire object has when the fire has been extinguished or just burnt out. Do Not Tune.

Tunable.description: The ObjectState used to track a fire objects progress. Do not Tune.

Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableList.name: FIRE_PANIC_BUFFS
TunableList.description: A List of Buffs that indicate a Sim is in a panic state because of fire. This will be used to limit their behaviors while they are aware of a fire on the lot.

TunableTuple.name: FIRE_PLACEMENT_RANGE
TunableTuple.description:
A tunable to represent how far from an existing fire object that new fire object can be placed. The value represents multiples of the radius of the fire object.
Example a value of 2 means that it is ok to place the new fire object 2 * the object radius away from the existing fire location. This is the minimum because anything less will overlap with the existing fire object on placement.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: FIRE_QUADTREE_RADIUS
Tunable.description: Size of the fire's quadtree footprint used for spatial queries

TunableVariant.name: FIRE_REACTION_NOTIFICATION
TunableVariant.description: The notification that is displayed whenever the first Sim reacts to the fire so that the player can click on the sim and center in on the sim to help find the fire. (This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a Notification tuning snippet.)

ex. Earbuds audio will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description:
If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not.
If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played.
ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected.

Tunable.name: immediate_audio
Tunable.description:
If checked, this audio will be triggered immediately, nothing will block.
ex. Earbuds audio will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name_hash
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the audio is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot. Otherwise the audio will be attached to the object's origin.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this audio is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description:
If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not.
If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played.
ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected.

TunableVariant.name: background_audio
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, play background audio while the dialog is open.

Tunable.name: FIRE_STRENGTH_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: The commodity that represents the strength of a fire.

Tunable.name: FIRE_STRENGTH_COMMODITY_SUPRESSION_DECAY
Tunable.description: The amount of decay modifier to add to an objects FIRE_STRENGTH_COMMODITY when it is being supresssed by a sprinkler. No negative numbers.

Tunable.name: FLAMMABLE_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: The commodity used to determin if an object is flammable or not.

Tunable.name: FLAMMABLE_COMMODITY_DECAY_PER_FIRE
Tunable.description: The amount of decay modifier to add to an objects FLAMMABLE_COMMODITY per fire object that is overlapping with it. No negative numbers.

Tunable.name: INTERACTION_UNAVAILABLE_DUE_TO_FIRE_TOOLTIP
Tunable.display: Interaction Unavailable Due To Fire Tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip to show in the grayed out tooltip when the player tries to interact with things on a lot that has a fire.

Tunable.name: MAX_NUM_ATTEMPTS_TO_PLACE_FIRE
Tunable.display: Max Num Attempts To Place Fire
Tunable.description: When trying to spread fire, this is the number of times an attempt will be made to find a place to put the new fire down without overlapping before giving up.

Tunable.name: ROUTING_FIRE_CHECK_RADIUS
Tunable.description: The radius in which a routing sim has to be within in order to possibly catch on fire

Tunable.name: SAVE_LOCK_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description: The tooltip/message to show when the player tries to save the game while a fire situation is happening

Tunable.name: SCORCH_TERRAIN_CLEANUP_HOUR
Tunable.description: Hour of the day to attempt to clean up any scorch marks that are on terrain. Range: 0-23 Default: 3 = 3am

Tunable.name: SCORCH_TERRAIN_CLEANUP_RADIUS
Tunable.description: The radius in which a clean scorch mark call will remove scorch marks

Tunable.name: SPRINKLER_ACTIVATION_TIME
Tunable.description: Time in sim minutes after a fire starts on a lot before activating the sprinkler system.

TunableTuple.name: SPRINKLER_EFFECT
TunableTuple.description:
Distributable Primitive-like object (it supports the running/stop/write API) that represents a visual effect parented to a game object.
Call start() to start the effect and stop() to stop it.

Tunable.name: effect_name
Tunable.description: The name of the effect to play.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the visual effect is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot.

Tunable.name: Slot
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this effect is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_immediate
Tunable.description:
If checked, this effect will be triggered immediately, nothing will block.
ex. VFX will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

Tunable.name: SPRINKLER_FLOOR_SUPPRESSION_RADIUS
Tunable.description: The radius within which a floor sprinkler will suppress fires.

Tunable.name: SPRINKLER_HEAD_SUPPRESSION_RADIUS
Tunable.description: The radius within which a sprinkler head will suppress fires.

Tunable.name: SPRINKLER_PUDDLE_CHANCE
Tunable.description: Chance for a puddle to appear somewhere in the sprinkler's area of effect.

Tunable.name: SPRINKLER_RUN_TIME
Tunable.description: Time in sim minutes between sprinkler system checks. It will check for new fires, and deactivate if there are no fires left burning.

Tunable.name: START_PANIC_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: The interaction to look for when a Sim reacts to a fire to know to start that Sim in the panic state.
